Package me.yleoft.zAPI.skull

Class SkullBuilder

java.lang.Object
me.yleoft.zAPI.skull.SkullBuilder
public abstract class SkullBuilder extends Object
SkullUtils is a utility class for handling player skulls in Minecraft. It provides methods to get the correct head material based on the server version, and to create skull ItemStacks from player names.
